pkgmetadata.longdescription: Gnopernicus provides Assistive Technologies (AT) for blind and visually impaired person. It enables users with limited vision, or no vision, to use the Gnome 2 desktop and Gnome/GTK+-2 applications effectively. By providing automated focus tracking and fullscreen magnification, Gnopernicus will aid low-vision Gnome users, and its screen reader features will allow low-vision and blind users access to standard GTK+2 and Java-based GUI applications via speech and Braille output.
